projects.title: DiaryVerse
projects.description: Secure digital diary platform with JWT authentication, Markdown support, private/public toggle, and notification system built using MERN stack.

projects.title: TheCinePass
projects.description: Movie ticket booking platform with TMDB API integration, Stripe payments, and Clerk-based authentication.

projects.title: Airbnb Clone
projects.description: Airbnb-style listing platform with Passport.js authentication, EJS templating, MongoDB, and Google Maps integration.

projects.title: MoneyMind
projects.description: Cross-platform financial tracker using React Native, Neon DB, and Redis, featuring push notifications and secure session handling.

projects.title: MedSupervision Platform
projects.description: OCR-powered medical report analysis with Gemini API integration, prescription categorization, selective sharing, and multi-user support.

projects.title: Pixelated Image Detection
projects.description: Image enhancement using SRGAN (TensorFlow) with Flask backend, improving clarity in pixelated images by 70% (measured via PSNR).

projects.title: BudgetMentor
projects.description: AI-powered budgeting assistant with smart tracking, GPT-4 integration for suggestions, and personalized analytics dashboard.

projects.title: Quiz Master
projects.description: Dynamic quiz web app with admin panel, real-time scoring, question bank, and analytics, deployed with Flask and SQLite.
